announcements: M. Thiodon Begs to return Thanks for the Favours he has received, and to inform the Ladies and Gentlemen of Nottingham and its Vicinity, that as his Exhibition will close this Week, he will, during the remainder of his short Stay, offer a great Variety of new Entertainments, superior to any that have ever yet been presented to the Public, and his utmost Exertions will be used to please, and to give satisfaction to his auditors.

shows.venue: the Grand New Assembly Room, Exchange, Nottingham
notes: Show is an exhibition of animated sceneries and art pieces: See playbill for specifics.
